metadata.synopsis: The players come upon a ritual setup where subjects are captured and held in glass containers while the magic drains their life and turns them into undead.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Start colony from the entrance room.Approach the ritual setup near S_COL_NecromancerLab_PAD_RitualArea_c16720bf-5746-4f13-aa04-f683ee970393

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Curious setup. Think I'll keep my distance.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: A ritual space. To turn the living undead, looks like.
